casebody.data:
Ralph Monroe HAIR, Appellant,
v.
UNIVERSITY COMMUNITY HOSPITAL, INC., n/k/a Florida Hospital Tampa; Julie Goddard, as Guardian of the Property of J.D.S., a minor; St. Joseph's Women's Hospital, a wholly-owned subsidiary of St. Joseph's Hospital, Inc.; Pediatrix Medical Group of Florida, Inc. ; and The University of South Florida Board of Trustees, Appellees. Case No. 2D15-3296 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed October 13, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
